website_summaries.verdict: Fast-shooting fun for a low price. However, it's not as action-packed as Nerf models with rapid-fire capabilities.
pros: No need for batteries thanks to spring action
Blasts two rounds with one shot
cons: Limited fire power and durability compared to some others, and jams are common

customer_reviews.title: Not the best "specs" but very fun
customer_reviews.text: Not as great as the Nemesis, but it's a good gun. The Rival balls are far superior to the classic nerf darts for accuracy and distance. The Rival series is a lot less frustrating for me. I'm a 38 year old father and play with my 10 and 7 year old boys. Their imagination allows them to enjoy the classic nerf darts where I just wish they performed better. These Rivals series do perform better. Our 7 year old picked this Atlas out. It shoots 2 balls at once, which while not really helpful, is really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Really powerfull
customer_reviews.text: My sons love all Nerf guns and this one is no exception. I feel like sometimes our house is over-flowing with Nerf guns, it seems that is all they ask for during Christmas or birthdays. Still fairly safe to play with indoors but really fun when you get to play outdoors. (Too cold right now) We like to set up shooting galleries for the boys with cardboard boxes and Solo cups.
customer_reviews.author: Hickok

customer_reviews.title: This thing is big. Fires 2 balls at a ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is big. Fires 2 balls at a time. Not as accurate as the single shot guns, but just as powerful. The longer magazine of the xvi-1200 works in the smaller 700, but not the other way. These rival guns shoot harder and farther than the dart based Nerf guns. Take that into consideration if buying for a younger child. Pictured with the Apollo-700 for size comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Another bad one!
customer_reviews.text: Jams jams jams! Every other shot a ball basically rolls out not the 2 it should fire then the next shot you would get 3 or 4 who knows? You have to hold the priming handle forward to get it to fire with any speed at all. Seems every nerf gun i have bought for the kids either need replaced or i must modify them to make them work right. Many other brands do so much better. Only 1 dart zone i ever had to return. Nerf may of started these but they don't build things that work right!
customer_reviews.author: mopar

customer_reviews.title: Its a very fun toy but my kids have a real tough time ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a very fun toy but my kids have a real tough time charging it for a shot. My biggest gripe is that you have no idea if you are out of ammo so you always have to take a confirmation shot to know. I would probably give it 3.5 stars if it were possible.
customer_reviews.author: hello

customer_reviews.title: Gift for kids that gets them away from video games
customer_reviews.text: I love giving nerf guns to my kids for presents— they have ‘nerf gun wars’ with each other and it keeps them away from the tv. It’s worth buying a gun that’s a little better than the low end ones, the kids get more excited to pull them out and use them
customer_reviews.author: Erin Clegg

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing waste of money
customer_reviews.text: After about 30 extremely frustrating minutes I finally was able to pump this thing only for all the balls to fall out. The ‘ready indicator’ on the back end was never ‘ready’ and I was unable to fire anything because, like I said, the balls just fell out the front. Totally disappointing and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly C.

customer_reviews.title: Some steps forward, some back, needs development.
customer_reviews.text: The new Rival series is much louder and harder to cock than the mega darts. The balls are more accurate than the old darts but the new clips take longer to load. Rival is a great idea but this feels like rushed version 1.0.
customer_reviews.author: GinDC

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: My son has tons of nerf guns and he really wanted the rival. I got it for him for Christmas and he loved it. It worked great until recently the nerf balls keep getting stuck or jammed inside and won't release them. We are out of the return period so we are stuck with a defective nerf gun.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal S.

customer_reviews.title: I truly believe Nurf products are built to break easily and often so that buyers will rebuy.
customer_reviews.text: I truly believe Nurf products are built to break easily and often so that buyers will rebuy. What a ripoff. Save the money and get another toy for your kid as all Nurf products jam all the time and are built to break easily.
customer_reviews.author: pool dude

customer_reviews.title: Nerf is a quality product... Great for kids gifts
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brothers kids and they love them... Along with four other guns and an extended Nerf bullet ball pack. Great for kids in the summer time
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Church

customer_reviews.title: Fun times!
customer_reviews.text: Fun times! Works as expected. The only con is the loud pop it makes when you shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Family

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Shoots poorly. Two balls at one time messes up accuracy and distance. Too big and bulky. Dumb design. Get a cheaper one that works better.
customer_reviews.author: Sam M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a kid with every gun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son because he loves nerf guns and he has so many of them. I wanted to get him one that was different. He really likes this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: Great power, easy to load
customer_reviews.text: Great power, easy to load. I don't suggest buying these for kids less than 10, as they are big, heavy, and require strength to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't get this again. The double shot feature is terrible and there's no way to turn it off. It's hard to prime and my kids couldn't prime it at all. Our other Nerf guns are much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Serious Shot Gun Style Action
customer_reviews.text: Heads up, this shoots 2 balls at once so buy extra ammo as you only get six shots per clip.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Karlis

customer_reviews.title: Other than that these are fantastic toys and lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit for all my (adult) siblings at Christmas! These little guys have a kick to them. Sometimes the ammo balls get stuck in the barrel and you have to push them out and on one of the guns we ordered it was very hard to cock it back. Other than that these are fantastic toys and lots of fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelise M.

customer_reviews.title: It works great, but didn't last very long.
customer_reviews.text: The nerf gun was an excellent gift for my nephew. Sadly, it broke in less than 1 month of occasional play. I don't know if I got a bad gun or they are just not made to last. Disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nerf still can't figure out quality.
customer_reviews.text: The slide function to reload is the same disappointing quality of almost all Nerf products. The seller was great...Neft not so much.
customer_reviews.author: amazon-z

customer_reviews.title: like it has a satifying cocking sound and firing sound
customer_reviews.text: a little loud. like it has a satifying cocking sound and firing sound. Definitely not stealthy. It's rated for teens, and smaller kids will struggle with cocking the gun.
customer_reviews.author: Jay.Etrom

customer_reviews.title: Just what they wanted
customer_reviews.text: This Rival works great. My boys love it. Watch out because it hurts when you get hit at close range.
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money on the XVII-3000 Blaster which is essentially the same gun but performs better with higher capacity
customer_reviews.text: Gun is ok. Spend the money on the XVII-3000 Blaster which is essentially the same gun but performs better with higher capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This nerf gun was a hit with my grandson! A great gift for a nerf gun lover!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Loud and proud
customer_reviews.text: Looks good it works well it fires good hasnt jammed yet only draw back is its loud as hell when pumped and font dry fire it sound like its breaking but if your loud and proud this is for u
customer_reviews.author: Austin hunsberger

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats the Apollo in strength and accuracy and overall fun of use
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Seems there is not much consistency in how far each shot goes. Nothing beats the Apollo in strength and accuracy and overall fun of use. Buy the Apollo!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully the next edition of these shooters is a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully the next edition of these shooters is a little more precise. The pellets definitely have a spin that curves them beyond 10ft or so.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised... No complaints here... I use it at work everyday with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Esteves

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, signficant upgrade from Dart blasters
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. Amazingly powerful, great range. Recommend kids wear safety glasses, great for some all around Nerf fun.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Oh yeah
customer_reviews.text: Has a little more umph than the darts. And the balls bounce off the walls.
customer_reviews.author: Chad S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so much fun...got the wife one too, settling arguments has never been so fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: This gun consistently jams. Not sure if it is defective or just a bad gun in general. Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Cawley

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his gun. Added to his collection. Easy to shot and reload.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but not really a toy for small children
customer_reviews.text: These shoot much harder and faster than I expected. And they shoot two at a time. I guess I should have read the description more carefully. Very nice, but not really a toy for small children.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nerf Blaster
customer_reviews.text: This was on my 9 year old grandson's wish list for his birthday. It was a hit. He loved it. Best price I found
customer_reviews.author: Beverly tobbe

customer_reviews.title: Great nerf gun
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good, and only jammed up once. It was a little bigger than I expected. I definity do not regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This gun broke within hours. The gun jams & the release doesn’t work. Ordered two & the same happened twice. DO NOT waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Carter

customer_reviews.title: it worked fine and then the next day we had a nerf ...
customer_reviews.text: it worked fine and then the next day we had a nerf war and it broke i toke it apart and it did not help do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: tara gray

customer_reviews.title: As with all Nerf guns, it began malfunctioning within ...
customer_reviews.text: As with all Nerf guns, it began malfunctioning within a couple of days; shooting two balls out at a trickle with each pull of the trigger.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley T Hellwig

customer_reviews.title: Great gun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Nerf gun. I’d recommend not dry firing very loud but still a great blaster.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle W Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. The weight of the guns and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. The weight of the guns and the sturdiness on the rival series are great. They shoot two shots at a time !
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Better options for the money
customer_reviews.text: Jams all the time. Like thats its "manly" but would not recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Nash

customer_reviews.title: Jamming
customer_reviews.text: The reset button dose not work and it keeps jamming
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Jammed the very first time my grandson played with it. Had to cut the ball out. Jams constantly
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate. Harder to cock than I expected when I bought it for my 9yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this at christmas time. I just gave ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this at christmas time. I just gave it as a birthday present and it is missing pieces and doesn't work. :( It's a shame b/c my nephew was so excited until he took it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: K...,

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: mine kept getting jammed and then eventually it broke... Don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has got to be the worst nerf rival gun I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the worst nerf rival gun I have ever tried. I got two of these for my nephews and were hoping to have done fun playing with them. That unfortunately was not the case. We spent more time trying to un jam them than actually playing and they lost interest in playing rather quickly. I will be returning them and getting the Rival Helios XVIII-700. It is a far superior gun and it doesn’t jam. Don’t waste you time or money on this gun. It needs to go back to the drawing board!! Nerf Needs to focus on it as a single shot instead of double.
customer_reviews.author: James G. Purcell

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it so why not give it five stars
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it so why not give it five stars. It does require batteries so make sure you get them too when you order one or two.
customer_reviews.author: FlightDeck

customer_reviews.title: It worked great in the beginning but a couple hours in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Used one day for an all-day nerf gun fight. It worked great in the beginning but a couple hours in the thing would jam. Or misfire. Not helpful when you are trying to win a war.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Rubino

customer_reviews.title: Guns are great and lots of fun when functioning correctly
customer_reviews.text: Guns are great and lots of fun when functioning correctly. They jam pretty easily if you do not operate the cocking mechanism all the way forward and then back to the original position which sounds logical but it is pretty easy to short it. This leads to the balls getting stuck since it shoots 2 at a time. This can be difficult for younger kids to do since the gun is long and the mechanism is fairly strong. It also seems to shoot at different distances which may be the balls colliding but I couldn't tell.
customer_reviews.author: D C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: He loved the power of the shot and how far it shoots
customer_reviews.author: Chris V

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot of fun, but the pumping action gets stuck sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Needs 6 D size batteries
customer_reviews.text: The gun is great, it would be nice to receive some sort of notification that 6 D size batteries are required.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy.
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. Hours of fun. Sent and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: farmer_john1

customer_reviews.title: His dad loved it as well
customer_reviews.text: This was for my grandson's birthday. His dad loved it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie C. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Item did not come in Nerf packaging but in a Hasbro brown box. Looked used. It doesn't work that well either. Don't know if it's just the gun or it acutally was used. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Gun jammed after a few days of using it the balls get stuck for both guns I bought
customer_reviews.author: samantha lopez

customer_reviews.title: You can not dodge these amazing 2 shots
customer_reviews.text: BOOIIIII!!! THIS THING IS A GOD! This thing is so intimidating! It shoots so fast, so far, and so hard. You can not dodge these amazing 2 shots. Has a twelve round mag, no jams, smooth operation, loud priming and shooting, cool features, and if you have thos gun in a war, you're officially a badass.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: packs a punch!
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful! They kind of hurt when my kid directs it at me :) He likes it, though. Nice new option from Nerf rather than bullets/discs.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganGirl

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Nerf Atlas Apollo Instead!
customer_reviews.text: Jammed after loading the magazine twice and I could not clear the jam. Returned it and got the Apollo instead which my 10 year old likes much better in all regards. It is easier to load, cock and only shoots one ball instead of the Atlas which releases 2 balls with each shot making it very difficult to aim and also a lower velocity when the ball comes out of the gun.Also cheaper. The Apollo does come with fewer balls but those are very inexpensive on Amazon so just buy 25 or 50 extra and let your kids fire away!
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: Gun did not work. Could not pull back lever ...
customer_reviews.text: Gun did not work.Could not pull back lever. Returned item
customer_reviews.author: Vera Austin

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: It was ok, the main problem is that it hurts a bit when you get hit. To play with it my son and I started using padded coats. The shots of the gun are fairly inaccurate as both of them go in different ways. Very loud when firing. Make sure to use helmets when playing this.
customer_reviews.author: KE XU

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Nerf gun
customer_reviews.text: This toy was one of the favorites at Christmas this year. The first shot sounds extremely intimidating and I almost regretted buying it for the kids, but the bark is worse than the bite and it doesn't hurt to be shot by the little balls. A spontaneous Nerf war broke out and the whole family enjoyed battling with this and the Nerf Zombie Strike Doominator Blaster. Definitely recommend this one for kids and adults of all ages. You may need to assist the kids with loading the balls at first, but they'll get the hang out of it pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Elle W

product_meta.title: Nerf Rival Atlas XVI-1200 Blaster (Red)
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingExperience intense head-to-head competition with the ultimate power of the Nerf Rival Atlas XVI-1200 blaster! Choose a blaster color and go into battle as the Red Team or the Blue Team. Deliver a double shot with the Atlas XVI-1200 blaster that fires 2 rounds at a time. The blaster has a spring-action cocking mechanism and fires at a velocity up to 80 fps (24 mps). It comes with 24 rounds and an easy-load, 12-round magazine. Experience the intensity of Nerf Rival with the Atlas XVI-1200 blaster! Nerf and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Choose red or blue blaster to battle as Red Team or Blue Team
Spring-action blaster has a trigger lock, and tactical rail
Experience ultimate precision and intense competition
Includes blaster, 12-round magazine, 24 rounds, and instructions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars324 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
